attributes.title: Help me fight
attributes.review: This app is so pathetic I don’t know why it’s an app I don’t get why they would have this app nor would want it because it’s so horrible and no one would like it because how horrible he is and how horrible this app is just like him he belongs in hell and TickTock belongs not to be banned he needs to be banned so let’s try our best to delete this app

attributes.title: hate this app!!
attributes.review: I got this app just to see what was going on and after just a few days of it being downloaded my phone started crash and my photos were getting deleted. then the cops showed up and said they were coming to get me because i deleted it. for you own safety don’t get this app.

attributes.title: App is so slow!
attributes.review: When I opened the app, it immediately took me to a webpage where my phone got hacked, then I had to take it to an Apple store to get it fixed, and I had to buy a new one!!😤😤 this app is not worth your time, money, phone storage or anything! #cancelthisapp oh and also starts to glitch out and take a lot of my data!SMH NEVER AGAIN!

attributes.title: A Hateful, Homophobic, Disgustingly Racist App!
attributes.review: Trump is trying to take away are freedom of speech by taking down TikTok, a platform that allows young people to spread positivity and promote a change in this country! Gen Z is powerful, Gen Z is strong! If a Cheeto tried to take away our platform, then we’ve got to fight back. Trump is racist, homophobic, and hateful! Down with Trump2020! We don’t need anymore of this kind of hate!

attributes.title: Doesn’t work
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and found the app to have tons of glitches, it was really hard to load things up and was just generally slow. I don’t know if they plan to fix any of these things, but I wouldn’t recommend downloading it unless you want to slow down your phone

attributes.title: Its the worst 😳❤️✨🧚
attributes.review: This app is the worst omg donald trump almost ran over me one time and this app is so horrible and racist like I dont get how yall brainwashed trump supporters like this its the absolute worse please delete it from the app store no one should ever see something so horrific like this 😢 dont delete tik tok because I WILL send peaches to the white house ✨🧚 much love~ not really disgusting racist pigs but to gen z I LOVE YOU GUYS❤️

attributes.title: disappointed.
attributes.review: I’m raising my kids to support their great president, Donald Trump. But the second i opened this app i was immediantly upset. There was little to no trump information and the app was constantly glitching. Even when i wasn’t on the app, my phone was acting a mess. I’d expect an app made by the best to be the best, not the worst. I’m worried it might have stole my information. Very sketchy.

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: i was really excited to download this app just for additional information about our amazing president donald trumpet...however i was soon very disappointed. the app took a very long time to download which didn’t make much sense to me. when it finally downloaded it wouldn’t open the first few times without crashing!! you would think the president of the united states would have a better engineered application. the design is subpar at best in terms of navigation and overall ease of use. i wouldn’t recommend this app to anyone. terrible setup, very disappointing.

attributes.title: Not what I expected
attributes.review:
From what I heard about this app I expected to be able to get in contact with our lord and saviour trump. But instead I was subjected to ad upon ad with nothing personalised to me. I just wanted my daddy to finally know how much he means to me so that I could receive his... uh... “love”, as it were. Is the president’s cheesy salty essence so much to ask for? Disappointing. 
😩👌😩👌😩👌

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app is the WORST app I have ever downloaded. It’s as if this app had given me war flashbacks it was so bad. I cannot even mention these unspeakable things this app has done to my life, my family, my neighbors dog, and even my pet turtle that died 5 years ago. Do NOT download. It’s vial, disgusting, and I wish to speak to the manager immediately. This app deserves 0 stars.
